price: Kuma da yawa* dabba wadda bã ta ɗaukar abincinta Allah Yanã ciyar da ita tãre da ku, kuma Shĩ ne Mai ji, Mai ilmi.
arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن دَآبَّةٖ لَّا تَحۡمِلُ رِزۡقَهَا ٱللَّهُ يَرۡزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
footnotes: * Sabõda haka tunãnin abinci kada ya hana ku yin hijira zuwa wurin yardar Allah, Mai ciyar da dabbõbin da bã su tattalin abincinsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waka-ayyin min dābbatin lā taḥmilu riz'qahā al-lahu yarzuquhā wa-iyyākum wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
